ev_setup_cpp_module()

install(
    DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/models/
    DESTINATION "${CMAKE_INSTALL_DATADIR}/everest/modules/${MODULE_NAME}/models/"
)
# ev@bcc62523-e22b-41d7-ba2f-825b493a3c97:v1

        "main/powermeterImpl.cpp"
)
